mapper.select: SELECT user_id as userId, content_id as contentId, LEAST(5, -- 评分上限为5分 (total_views * 0.35 + total_collects * 0.65 + -- 权重系数减半 CASE WHEN total_duration < 6000 THEN 0 WHEN total_duration < 20000 THEN 0.5 -- 分值减半 WHEN total_duration < 60000 THEN 1 -- 分值减半 ELSE 1.5 -- 分值减半 END ) / GREATEST(1, (total_views + total_collects)) * 5 -- 调整分母为5 ) AS score FROM (SELECT user_id, content_id, SUM(CASE WHEN type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_views, SUM(CASE WHEN type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_collects, SUM(CASE WHEN type = 3 THEN times ELSE 0 END) AS total_duration FROM flow_index WHERE type IN (1, 2, 3) AND content_type = #{contentType} GROUP BY user_id, content_id, content_type HAVING total_views > 0 OR total_collects > 0) AS aggregated_data ORDER BY score DESC
